title: Chapter 560 - Su Yi Arrives
volume_title: Sword Qi Fills The Autumn Skies
body:
Chapter 560 - Su Yi Arrives

The monsters of the ancient era laughed. They seemed jubilant.

That flippant, disdainful, playful attitude made Gu Cangning furrow his brow. 

Nonetheless, he had to admit that things had changed!

Before entering Sumeru Immortal Island, Su Yi, Huan Shaoyou, and the other monsters of the ancient era were all in the Origin Dao.

But now, Huan Shaoyou and his companions had stepped into the Spiritual Manifestation Realm. They now transcended the Origin Dao!

Furthermore, each monster of the ancient era had stronger talent and foundations than the one before. The moment they stepped into the Spiritual Manifestation Realm, they were already far from comparable to older-generation Spiritual Manifestation Realm cultivators.

And that’s before even mentioning the trump cards and killer weapons they had on them. Pick one at random, and Gu Cangning feared it’d be enough to present an enormous threat to Su Yi!

If they joined forces…

What chance of victory did Su Yi have left?

At the end of the day, Su Yi’s cultivation is his fatal flaw. If he were in the Spiritual Manifestation Realm too, they wouldn’t dare be this brazen, thought Gu Cangning.
